itunes:title: How to Be Certain You’re Going to Heaven - Part 3
title: How to Be Certain You’re Going to Heaven - Part 3
description: The greatest gift you’ve ever been given wasn’t bought in a store, yet it cost the Giver everything. In this message, Pastor Rick explains why Jesus had to come to Earth and die so that you could be made right with God—and how you can accept his great gift of grace.
